description:
Marlene Mhangami


Director and vice-chair for the Python Software Foundation and is currently working as a Developer Advocate at Voltron Data. In 2017, she co-founded ZimboPy, a non-profit organization that gives Zimbabwean young women access to resources in the field of technology. She is also the previous chair of PyCon Africa and is an advocate for women in tech on the continent



Social Networks:

Github: https://github.com/marlenezw
Twitter: https://twitter.com/marlene_zw
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/marlenemhangami/

More About PyCon Colombia at http://www.pycon.co
title: Keynote - Marlene Mhangami
